Docs.summary: Provides the base class for serializing a reflection primitive within the object graph.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.MemberCodeDomSerializer> class is a "meta" serializer; that is, is a serializer that does not serialize part of the object graph, but instead serializes a reflection primitive within the object graph. For example, a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.MemberCodeDomSerializer> would be associated with a <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor> in order for it to serialize a property. <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.MemberCodeDomSerializer> objects enable constructs, such as properties and events, to be logical, rather than requiring them to have a physical backing in code.
Unlike <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializer> classes, <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.MemberCodeDomSerializer> objects must be able to deserialize.
